text: I've fixed the setup file's license field, so that oauthlib can be built as an RPM with 'python setup.py bdist_rpm'
title: Fix broken setup.py bdist_rpm

title: Pull request merge from Unknown:fix_bdist_rpm to idan/oauthlib:master

text:
Thanks for the PR! 

I've personally never used bdist_rpm before and had no idea it was that broken. The fix should really be there and with the .spec it generates rather than in the licence field. However,  I rather have it being easy to to package and distribute oauthlib than nitpick =)

If you would happen to notice when this is fixed, please ping me or send another PR. Cheers
